songs.title: Whisperers (XO/The Host demo)
songs.lyrics:
Baby what you want from me
I just wanna see
Lay what you want to me
Do you wanna meet
I've been thinking 'bout it
For so long
For too long, yeah
(aye) So tell me if you wanna go
Pull the camera's out
POV, POV
Girl you bring your [?]
With your POV, POV
I love it when your eyes are red
Are you on my cloud? Yeah
Looking so pretty with them mmh, base
And your hair is a mess
And you're so obsessed
Oh my, do what I want to see
And you know, I gotta catch a glimpse of you[?]
I gotta catch all,  All the things that you do
(wo-ho)(ayee)
With the cameras out
POV, POV
(ayee)
With the cameras out
Get that POV, POV
I love it when your eyes
I love it when your eyes are red
And your hair's a mess
Are you on my cloud? Yeah
Are you on my cloud? Oh yeah
When your eyes are red
I make you say
Are you on my cloud? Yeah
Are you on my cloud? Hey
Woah, woah
Oh, oh, to you
Oh, oh, just sing it
Oh, oh, just sing it
Uh, uh, just sing it
Oh, oh, just sing it
Oh, oh, yeah
